Throw.NAME: Throw
Throw.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard !M! card. NL Draw !M! card.
Throw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Draw !M! cards.

IED.NAME: IED
IED.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Throw. NL Arm.

DesertEagle.NAME: Desert Eagle
DesertEagle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Arm.

BombMaking.NAME: Bomb Making
BombMaking.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *IED into your hand.
BombMaking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *IED+ into your hand.

FlashBang.NAME: Flashbang
FlashBang.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Throw. NL Arm.

TimeBomb.NAME: TimeBomb
TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: At the end of enemy turn, deal !M! damage. NL Throw. NL Arm.

Smoke.NAME: Smoke Bomb
Smoke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Throw. NL Arm.

M84.NAME: Shock Bomb
M84.DESCRIPTION: Stun a random enemy. NL Throw. NL Arm.
M84.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun ALL enemies. NL Throw. NL Arm.

FireExtinguisher.NAME: Fire Extinguisher
FireExtinguisher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Throw.

M18A1.NAME: Mines
M18A1.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you are attacked, deal equal damage back. NL Exhaust. NL Arm.

M249.NAME: M249
M249.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Arm.

M870.NAME: M870
M870.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable !M! times. NL Arm.

M92.NAME: Empty Magazine
M92.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust. NL Arm.

Flash.NAME: Flash
Flash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card.
Flash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card.

SwivelThrow.NAME: Swivel Throw
SwivelThrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard 1 card.

Reload.NAME: Reload
Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

FuelTankCar.NAME: Fuel Tank
FuelTankCar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Anti-tank. NL Arm.

SSM1.NAME: SSM1
SSM1.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 6 times. NL Anti-tank. NL Arm.

AT4.NAME: AT4
AT4.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Anti-tank. NL Arm.

DodgeShot.NAME: Evasive Shot
DodgeShot.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

Mercy.NAME: Mercy
Mercy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !M!x basic damage, otherwise apply !M! Weak.

Clean.NAME: Cleanup
Clean.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, add a copy of it into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Hunt.

Hunt.NAME: Hunt
Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Hunt.

Kick.NAME: Kick
Kick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses Strength this turn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

GunsWorkBetterThanMagic.NAME: Guns Work Better
GunsWorkBetterThanMagic.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Arms into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
GunsWorkBetterThanMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X random Upgraded Arms into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Detonate.NAME: Detonate
Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose !M! Exhaust card in your discard pile. NL Play the chosen card.

Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Arm.

GrandEntrance.NAME: Grand Entrance
GrandEntrance.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Can only be played if no other cards were played this turn. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Confrontation.NAME: Confrontation
Confrontation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL End your turn.

TimeStop.NAME: Time Stop
TimeStop.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The next card you play costs 0 this turn.

Pretend.NAME: Pretend
Pretend.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play costs 0 this turn. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Lose !M! HP.
Pretend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The next card you play costs 0 this turn. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Lose !M! HP.

Treatment.NAME: Purify
Treatment.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all of your Status. NL Exhaust.
Treatment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all of your Status. NL Exhaust.

Production.NAME: Mass Production
Production.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Arm card. Add copies of that card into your hand until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

Untie.NAME: Untie
Untie.DESCRIPTION: Become immune to Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.

Clocks.NAME: Clock
Clocks.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 12 cards, add a *Vault into your hand.
Clocks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 12 cards, add a *Vault+ into your hand.

MoveAndFire.NAME: Run and Gun
MoveAndFire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain !M! Block.

Stock.NAME: Stock Up
Stock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Arm into your hand.
Stock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Upgraded Arm into your hand.

Stamina.NAME: Stamina
Stamina.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack, draw a random Skill from your draw pile. NL When you play a Skill, draw a random Attack from your draw pile.

RedRibbon.NAME: Red Hair Band
RedRibbon.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
RedRibbon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.

FalseTown.NAME: False Town
FalseTown.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! new Servant to your draw pile and add !M! random Curse to your discard pile.
FalseTown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! new Servant to your draw pile and add !M! random Curse to your discard pile.

LawOfCycles.NAME: Law of Cycles
LawOfCycles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, Exhaust it, then add a *Miracle into your hand.

ThePriceOfMiracles.NAME: The Price of Miracles
ThePriceOfMiracles.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Miracles into your hand. NL Add a random Curse into your discard pile.

Feeding.NAME: Feeding
Feeding.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL If it was a Curse, draw 1 card and gain [E]. NL If it was a Status, draw 2 cards. NL Otherwise, draw 1 card.

Contract.NAME: Contract
Contract.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Wish to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Add a random Curse to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Contract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Wish+ to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Add a random Curse to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Hope.NAME: Hope
Hope.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a *Despair into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Maze.NAME: Maze
Maze.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each SaveLoad. NL Add a *Despair into your discard pile. NL Exhaust. NL !M! SaveLoads.
Maze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each SaveLoad. NL Add a *Despair into your discard pile. NL !M! SaveLoads.

Strong.NAME: Stronger
Strong.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP and gain 1 Strength for each SaveLoad. NL !M! SaveLoads.

Twining.NAME: Twining
Twining.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Constricted for each SaveLoad. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E]. NL !M! SaveLoads.

Alone.NAME: Alone
Alone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each unique card in your deck. NL Add a *Despair into your discard pile. NL !B! unique cards.
Alone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each unique card in your deck. NL Curses add additional Block. NL Add a *Despair into your discard pile. NL !B! unique cards.

Demon.NAME: Demon
Demon.DESCRIPTION: Playable with a combination of 15+ Curses and Servant types. NL Deal !D! x !M! damage. NL Instant kill normal enemies that would have 30 or less HP. NL Total: !M!/ 15
Demon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Playable with a combination of 15+ Curses and Servant types. NL Deal !D! x !M! damage. NL Instant kill normal enemies that would have 30 or less HP. NL Total: !M!/ 15

Encircle.NAME: Encircle
Encircle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each kind of Servant. NL Hunt. NL !M! Servant kinds.

Ruin.NAME: Ruin
Ruin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each Curse card you have. NL !M! Curse cards.

Separate.NAME: Separate
Separate.DESCRIPTION: Steal 1 Strength for each Curse card you have. NL Exhaust. NL !M! Curse cards.

Witch.NAME: Witch
Witch.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each Curse card you have. NL !M! Curse cards.
Witch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Strength for each Curse card you have. NL !M! Curse cards.

Mud.NAME: Mud
Mud.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies for each Curse card you have. NL !M! Curse cards.

No1.NAME: Arrogance
No1.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Servant.

No2.NAME: Gloomy
No2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add a *Decay into your discard pile. NL Servant.

No3.NAME: Lie
No3.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Switch the enemy's intention. NL Servant.
No3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switch the enemy's intention. NL Servant.

No5.NAME: Willful
No5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Servant.

No6.NAME: Sharp Tongue
No6.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Constricted. NL Add a *Regret into your discard pile. NL Servant.

No7.NAME: Dull
No7.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove a random buff from your target if it is not a boss enemy. NL Servant.
No7.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all buffs from your target if it is not a boss enemy. NL Servant.

No8.NAME: Jealousy
No8.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the most HP. NL Servant.

No9.NAME: Lazy
No9.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slow to a random enemy. NL Servant.
No9.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slow to ALL enemies. NL Servant.

No10.NAME: Vanity
No10.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage for every 50 Gold you have. NL Servant.

No11.NAME: Cowardice
No11.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Shame into your discard pile. NL Servant.

No12.NAME: Stupid
No12.DESCRIPTION: Choose your draw pile at most !M! cards into the discard pile. NL Servant.

No13.NAME: Grumpy
No13.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Normality into your discard pile.  NL Servant.

No14.NAME: Stubborn
No14.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Servant.

No15.NAME: Love？
No15.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw or discard this card, gain [E]. NL Servant.
No15.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw or discard this card, gain [E] [E]. NL Servant.

MagicLongbow.NAME: Magic Longbow
MagicLongbow.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switch the enemy's intention.

ModifyMemory.NAME: Modify Memory
ModifyMemory.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Switch the enemy's intention.

Puzzle.NAME: Puzzle
Puzzle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upon adding this card to your deck, remove other Puzzles from your deck and permanently increase this card's Block by the Block removed.

Coercion.NAME: Coercion
Coercion.DESCRIPTION: !M!% chance to force the non-Boss enemy to escape and gain 30 Gold. NL For each % Max HP lost, increase chance by 1%. NL Exhaust.
Coercion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL !M!% chance to force the non-Boss enemy to escape and gain 30 Gold. NL For each % Max HP lost, increase chance by 1%. NL Exhaust.

CauseAndEffect.NAME: Cause and Effect
CauseAndEffect.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cannot be removed from your deck. NL You've been SaveLoads !M! times.

Despair.NAME: Despair
Despair.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of SaveLoads. NL lose !M! HP.
